channel.title: CVE Feed for sagemathinc -- cocalc
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sagemathinc -- cocalc

item.title: CVE-2024-36109|2024-06-04T17:47:59.256Z -- sagemathinc -- cocalc
item.description: CoCalc is web-based software that enables collaboration in research, teaching, and scientific publishing. In affected versions the markdown parser allows `<script>` tags to be included which execute when published. This issue has been addressed in commit `419862a9c9879c`. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.
